about_the_game:
Get ready for a 60-day ocean odyssey to explore the surrounding waters of Kaiji No Ri island with the Japan Odyssey Pack. Bring along your friends on the luxurious Volans™ fishing yacht! It accommodates up to four players and features two rod holders for each player for trolling and bottom fishing, as well as ample storage for your catches.

Invest in top-notch saltwater bottom fishing equipment from Tsurihito™ and trolling gear from Fletch and Bradford™ with all kinds of baits and lures, to just enjoy landing those giant ocean dwellers.

With the spacious 300+ items Tackle wagon provided, you'll have all the necessary tackle at your disposal. Make the most of the Advanced License, a Premium Account for maximizing your earnings and XP, and entire 50 Markers and 20 Navigation Buoys for easy exploration of the best fishing spots in the island waters!

Japan Odyssey Pack includes:
* 100000 CREDITS
* 100 BAITCOINS
* 60-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Marker Buoys
* 150 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

20 NAVIGATION BUOYS


FISHING YACHT
* Tsurihito™ Volans™ Fishing Yacht - Max Speed: 30 kn; Fish Storage: 4409 Lb (2000 kg); Maximum seats: 4; Rod Holders: 8; Length: 39.4 ft (12 m); Width: 18 ft (5.5 m); Weight: 18500 Lb (8400 kg); Material: Fiberglass; Engine: 770 hp; Echo Sounder: Oem, ElitePro, CircleScanning; GPS: Yes; Detailing: Ultra; Max Single Fish Weight: 661 Lb (300 kg); Fish-Friendly: No


RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Fletch and Bradford™ ReefRider 5' 5" (165) Max SE - Length: 5' 5" (1.65 m); Lure Weight: 1 1/4–7 Oz (36-200 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 61–159 Lb (27.5-72.5 kg); Action: Fast
* Tsurihito™ Ryōshi Kaito HJ 5' 3" (160) SE - Length: 5' 3" (1.6 m); Casting Weight: 3 1/2–21 Oz (100–600 g); Power: X Heavy; Line Weight: 83–194 Lb (37.5–88 kg); Action: Fast

Reels:
* Tsurihito™ MaguroMaster Gold 18000 - Ratio: 7.4; Recovery: 45.3" (115 cm); Capacity: Mono 132/370 (1.0/370), Braid 104/900 (0.42/900); Max Drag: 159 Lb (72 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal
* Tsurihito™ RaidenWheel HeavyDuty 20000 SE - Ratio: 7; Recovery: 39.4" (100 cm); Capacity: Mono 176/360 (1.2/360), Braid 159/950 (0.46/950); Max Drag: 192 Lb (87 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal


TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length: 2500 yd (2500 m):
OceanPower Mono .0433" (1.1 mm) - Test: 154 Lb (70 kg)
OceanPower Mono .049" (1.25 mm) - Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
ZenLine Braid .0181" (0.46 mm) - Test: 159 Lb (72 kg)
ZenLine Braid .0189" (0.48 mm) - Test: 185 Lb (84 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0452 (1.15) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 154 Lb (70 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .0452 (1.15) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 154 Lb (70 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 3' 3" (1 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)
* HinomaruClear Fluorocarbon Leader .051 (1.3) (x15) - Length: 4' 11" (1.5 m); Test: 187 Lb (85 kg)

* Saltwater Curved Hooкs: #8/0 (x15), #10/0 (x15), #12/0 (x15), #14/0 (x15), #16/0 (x15), #18/0 (x15)
* Livebait Trolling Hooks: #2/0 (x15), #3/0 (x15), #5/0 (x15), #7/0 (x15), #8/0 (x15), #10/0 (x15)
* Head Starter Sinkers: 1 3/4 Oz. (50 g) (x15), 2 3/4 Oz. (75 g) (x15), 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g) (x15), 4 3/4 Oz. (135 g) (x15), 6 Oz. (170 g) (x15)
* Pyramid Sinkers: 16 Oz. (450 g) (x3), 18 Oz. (500 g) (x3), 19 Oz. (550 g) (x3)
* Cannonball Sinkers: 5 1/2 Oz. (150 g) (x3), 6 Oz. (175 g) (x3), 7 Oz. (200 g) (x3)
* Snapper Sinkers: 9 Oz. (250 g) (x3), 10 1/2 Oz. (300 g) (x3), 12 1/3 Oz. (350 g) (x3), 14 Oz. (400 g) (x3)
* Squid Chains: 6" (15 cm) 4 pcs (x6), 8" (20 cm) 5 pcs (x6)
* Plugs: 4 1/16 Oz. (115 g), #8/0 (x6); 5 3/10 Oz. (150 g), #10/0 (x6); 6 7/10 Oz. (190 g), #10/0 (x6)
* Trolling Octopuses: 1 1/2 Oz. (43 g), #4/0 (x9), 2 Oz. (57 g), #5/0 (x9); 2 1/2 Oz. (71 g), #6/0 (x9); 3 Oz. (85 g), #7/0 (x9)
* Baits: Shrimp (x50), Clam Meat (x50), Mussel Meat (x50), Sand Fleas (x50), Sea Worms (x50), Finger Mullets (x50), Gulf Shrimp (x50), Scaled Sardine (x50), Crab (x50), Japanese Spiny Lobster (x50), Japanese Flying Squid (x50), Japanese Anchovy (x50), Gutted Fish (x50), Medium Fish Strips (x50), Large Fish Strips (x50), Japanese Jack Mackerel (x50)


EQUIPMENT
* UL-CHUBER Tackle Wagon Quadro Pro - Tackles: 300; Lines: 25; Groundbait Components: 150


FISHING LICENSES (60 days):
Advanced Japan License


POND PASSES:
Kaiji No Ri Pass (60 Days)
detailed_description:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Get ready for a 60-day ocean odyssey to explore the surrounding waters of Kaiji No Ri island with the Japan Odyssey Pack. Bring along your friends on the luxurious Volans™ fishing yacht!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
